column4: can anyone help me with setting up my website i need to link www.dead1.com to /home/dead1/public_html/ how do i do that i have a 2nd website and i need to link that one to www.dead2.info to /home/dead2/public_html/ how do i do that
you're best asking in the right channel for your web server
ubuntu is the OS. apache/nginx/lighttpd etc are web servers
